description: Identifier for the fleet application or workgroup this progress record belongs to (likely a system/module name; confirm with SME).
Workflow status indicating the current progress state of the item being tracked; used to control process steps and reporting.
User or system identifier that created the record.
Date and time the record was created (timezone per system configuration; confirm with SME).
User or system identifier that last updated the record.
Date and time of the most recent update to the record (timezone per system configuration; confirm with SME).
Human readable description of the progress stage or status associated with the record.
